title: 【協助轉知】「2023年國際研討會- From Quality Assurance to Sustainable Development-How QA Advances the SDGs in Higher Education Institutions with a Global Approach」

大家好，

函轉社團法人台灣評鑑協會「2023年國際研討會」活動訊息如附。有意參加者請自行報名。謝謝。

報名網址：https://reurl.cc/YexROX 

Dear all,

This email is forwarding the related information of the 2023 International Webinar held by the Taiwan Assessment and Evaluation Association. If you are interested in participating, feel free to register using the online form below. Thank you very much. 

Registration: https://reurl.cc/YexROX

Have a nice day.

李莉莉 Li-Li Lee
